summary.Title: CNC operator jobs available in Horsens

Job description Skilled CNC

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: CNC operator jobs available in Horsens
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Type of employment: permanent
Location: Horsens
Starting date: as soon as possible

Job description
Skilled CNC Operators are needed in Horsens, Denmark. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by sending their application or calling +45 88448244 during our office hours: Monday-Thursday 9:00-15:00 and Friday 9:00-13:00.

Job duties and responsibilities

  • Operate CNC milling machines and manual turning, drilling mills, carousels, and vertical lathes to produce precision parts.

  • Read and interpret technical drawings and specifications.

  • Set up and adjust tooling, fixtures, and programs (for CNC machines).

  • Monitor machine operation and make necessary adjustments.

  • Perform quality control checks on finished parts.

  • Maintain a clean and safe work environment.

  • Collaborate with other team members to meet production goals.

Job requirements

  • Extensive experience operating turning, drilling mills, carousels, and vertical lathes (manual machines).

  • Experience with CNC milling machines is a plus.

  • Strong understanding of machining principles and techniques.

  • Ability to read and interpret technical drawings.

  • Proficient in the use of measuring tools (calipers, micrometers, etc.).

  • Good attention to detail and quality consciousness.

  • English skills: medium level required.

Qualifications

  • Driver's license required: B or BE recommended 

  • A relevant vocational education or apprenticeship is an advantage.

Salary and benefits

  • Hourly gross salary: starting from 200.00 kr./hour.

  • Both day and evening shifts are available.

  • Accommodation and transportation to work: provided if needed.

  • Eurojob Denmark may provide assistance for registration to SIRI, SKAT, BorgerService, and all the other authorities, free of charge.
